mapper.sql: id, type_id, parent_id, name, code, resource, resource_interface, level, type, op_type, remark, del_flag, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by
mapper.select: SELECT distinct tp.id, tp.type_id, tpt.name as type_name, tp.parent_id, tp.name, tp.code, tp.resource, tp.resource_interface, tp.level, tp.remark, tp.del_flag, tp.create_time, tp.update_time, tp.create_by, tp.update_by FROM tb_privilege tp INNER JOIN tb_role_privilege tsp ON tp.id = tsp.privilege_id INNER JOIN tb_role tr ON tsp.role_id = tr.id AND tr.id =#{roleId} LEFT JOIN tb_privilege_type tpt ON tpt.id = tp.type_id AND tpt.del_flag = 0 AND tp.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY tp.id
SELECT count( 1 ) FROM tb_privilege WHERE ISNULL( parent_id ) AND type = 0
